alert.note: Alert for Muskogee; Okfuskee; Okmulgee (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 24 at 12:03PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central McIntosh, southwestern Wagoner, Okmulgee, northwestern Muskogee, southeastern Tulsa and southeastern Okfuskee Counties through 1245 PM CDT... At 1203 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 2 miles south of Bixby to 2 miles southeast of Weleetka. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Okmulgee... Bixby... Coweta... Henryetta... Haskell... Morris... Weleetka... Dewar... Porter... Schulter... Taft... Boynton... Grayson... Council Hill... Hoffman... Stidham... Preston... Raiford... Vivian... Stonebluff... This includes Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 229 and 262. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
